channel.title: Runnning Servers From Remote LOcations
channel.description:
I just had a thought... Is there any way that a Web hoster or even a FOrum hoster (smfforfree) could host your server for you
I also had another idea but it would be slightly tricky to do- Why not hack google.com FTP server and put your server files in there and create a client that connects to ftp://google.com/server.class
OR something like that

item.title: Runnning Servers From Remote LOcations
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

but cant you change the port to 80 on your server and then host it on somewhere and make a client that downloads the server in a cache

Read full topic

item.title: Runnning Servers From Remote LOcations
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

You can have fun hacking google… as soon as you try you will like have cops around your house lol… and nope… none of the forum hosters can host for you… they are not compatible with the files

Read full topic
